org.jvnet.hk2.component
Class InhabitantHandleImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.jvnet.hk2.component.InhabitantHandleImpl<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
InhabitantHandle<T>
public class InhabitantHandleImpl<T>
extends Object
implements InhabitantHandle<T>

An InhabitantHandle represents one Inhabitant and its lifecycle into and out of the habitat.

Author:
Jeff Trent

Description copied from interface: InhabitantHandle
